Name: The Trials
About the game: The first skill is the recording, You can record the box movement for 40 seconds then play it back in reverse The second skill is the ability to move between to worlds A/B The third skill is a teleport station, you can drop it anywhere and teleport back to it I'm a solo developer, i started working on the Unreal engine at the start of 2021 and after 10 months of learning and working i'm publishing first project on it. I made the game without any coding, using the blueprints only.
